articles.title: Inspired by Canadian truck protests, 'People's Convoy' heads to Washington - Reuters
articles.description: A group of American truckers began a cross-country drive from California to Washington on Wednesday to protest coronavirus restrictions, taking a cue from demonstrations that paralyzed Canada's capital city, Ottawa, for weeks.
articles.content: ADELANTO, Calif., Feb 23 (Reuters) - A group of American truckers began a cross-country drive from California to Washington on Wednesday to protest coronavirus restrictions, taking a cue from demonst… [+4216 chars]

articles.title: Dunkin' Donuts temporarily closes all 19 outlets due to 'operational issue' - TODAY
articles.description: SINGAPORE — American doughnut and coffee chain Dunkin’ Donuts will be temporarily closing all its stores across the island from Wednesday (Feb 23) due to an “operational issue”.
articles.content:
